carousel.title1: Issue Exclusive Points/Coupons for Your Store
carousel.title2: Just a Few Steps and 1 Coin (¥500)
carousel.text:
Meet the needs of various retail merchants by issuing custom points/coupons for merchants
Build your own customer base
Encourage repeat visits from customers, increase customer loyalty
Help you expand your store's turnover

conetent.title: Custom Issue for 1 Coin, Maintenance for 0 Yen
conetent.text1: Set your own parameter names/descriptions, etc., and issue specialized points or coupons
conetent.text2: Issuing points or coupons only requires 1 coin worth ¥500
conetent.text3: Additional issuance or destruction can be done as needed, with only a ¥2 fee per transaction, and no maintenance fees

box1.title: Issuance
box1.text1:
Scan the user's QR code, enter the number of points, specify the coupon, and execute the issuance
Fee is only ¥2 per transaction*
Once the POS linkage function is online, it can be linked with the POS for execution

box2.title: Usage
box2.text1:
Scan the user's QR code, enter the number of points based on the points/coupons held in the user's account, specify the coupon, and execute the usage
Fee is only ¥2 per transaction*
(Once the POS linkage function is online, it can be linked with the POS for execution)

box3.title: Transparent History
box3.text1: The issuance and usage history of points/coupons can be freely checked at any time. The history information is stored on the blockchain to ensure that it cannot be tampered with or disappear

carousel.title2: Free and Flexible, Each Takes What They Need
carousel.text: Points/coupons in the account can be exchanged with other users, allowing points/coupons to be more freely and flexibly used. At the same time, merchants issuing points/coupons also expand their user base

box1.title: Exchange
box1.text1: Users can give points/coupons they hold to other users

box2.title: Exchange (Flea Market)
box2.text1: Users can list the points/coupons they hold in their accounts for exchange in the flea market, and specify the exchange conditions (desired points/coupons).
box2.text2: Other users can exchange the points/coupons they want when they see them in the market.

box3.title: Redemption
box3.text1: Two points issuing merchants can apply to the platform to establish a points redemption pool composed of points from both parties. The exchange rate, redemption fee rate, and redemption limit between points are determined by both merchants.
box3.text2: Users can exchange between two kinds of points through the dual points redemption pool. When using the redemption pool for exchange, users need to pay a certain amount of points to both points issuing merchants as redemption fees. The platform interaction fee is borne by the redemption user.
